name: erection

erection noun
(BUILDING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] formal the act of building or making a structure: They approved the erection of an electric fence around the prison.
[ C ] a building or other structure: This splendid if extraordinary erection from the last century is a local landmark. Synonyms
building
construction (BUILDING)
edifice formal

erection noun
(PENIS)
[ C ] When a man has an erection, his penis is temporarily harder and bigger than usual and points up: to get/have an erection
